title: BONUS EPISODE: Tracy Morgan Turns UP to Hip-Hop Classics, Shares 'SNL', 'The Last OG', +'Martin' Stories
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
It is ALWAYS a fun time when legendary comedian Tracy Morgan stops by Ebro in the Morning! The friend of the show came through with ALL of the energy starting with the importance of Rapper's Delight. He also shares stories about his career including his skits on 'SNL', time on 'The Last OG', and 'Martin', going away from alcohol, and shared some stories through the smooth sounds of Isley Bros and 'Love Is The Message'. He will appear at the NY Comedy Festival with a special stand up Tracy Morgan: No Disrespect on November 12. For more information https://nycomedyfestival.com #EbrointheMorning #HOT97 #TracyMorgan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
